column1: 1.) You are one step away from reaching the next level in an online game. What do you believe would accelerate your progress towards that goal?
column2: 2.) What approach would you consider to earn a free smartwatch from the fitness program organized by your community?
column3: 3.) Your favorite restaurant is offering a giveaway. Which of the following activities would you be willing to do in order to receive the giveaway?
column4: 4.) When playing board games with your friends, which of the following options best describes your strategy?
column5: 5.) You participate in a lottery to win a pair of concert tickets featuring a popular band. What are you willing to do to win the tickets?
column6: 6.) When engaging in a new game for the very first time, which of the following options best reflects your approach to playing?
column7: 7.) When looking for a credit card, which of the following factors holds the highest importance to you?
column8: 8.) When coordinating an event, what matters most to you?

column1: Pursuing higher rankings for better rewards
column2: To join a fitness group to meet new people
column3: To rate and review the food online
column4: I learn the game rules as you go
column5: I would share organizer's post on my social media
column6: I navigate the game by trial and error
column7: An option to encourage businesses to adopt the card
column8: That it is a sold-out event
